com.deco2800.game.leveleditor.ObstacleToolComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
GestureDetector.GestureListener, InputProcessor
public class ObstacleToolComponent
extends BaseToolComponent
Component for editing the obstacles within the map, such as platforms etc

  • Method Details

    • scrollSize

      public void scrollSize​(int step)
      This function will adjust the selected obstacle size by the selected step
      Parameters:
      step - either 1 for upward scrolling or -1 for downward scrolling

    • repositionEntity

      public void repositionEntity()
      Reposition the parent entity, ie when the mouse is moved. The tile should snap to a 0.5x0.5 coord grid

    • create

      public void create()
      Description copied from class: Component
      Called when the entity is created and registered. Initial logic such as calls to GetComponent should be made here, not in the constructor which is called before an entity is finished.
      Overrides:
      create in class InputComponent

      public void update()
      Description copied from class: Component
